sentences.english: Both sides still balk at his draft document's latest wording.
sentences.chinese: 双方仍就他的文件初稿里的最新措辞犹豫不决。

sentences.english: No one writes a perfect first draft.
sentences.chinese: 没人能写作一篇完美的初稿。

sentences.english: Allow yourself to write a crappy first draft.
sentences.chinese: 允许自己写一份蹩脚的初稿。

sentences.english: He's now revising the first draft of his essay.
sentences.chinese: 他目前正修改他的文章初稿。

sentences.english: Please propose amendments and addenda to the first draft of the document.
sentences.chinese: 请对这个文件的初稿提出修改和补充意见。

sentences.english: The first drafts of love are usually in need of considerable revision.
sentences.chinese: 爱情的“初稿”通常需要大篇幅修订。

sentences.english: This is your first draft. You have a voice.
sentences.chinese: 这是你的初稿，你有了自己的发言权。

sentences.english: The initial work of the screenwriter is usually referred to, simply, as the first draft.
sentences.chinese: 编剧最初的作品通常被称为初稿。

sentences.english: Completing the first draft of a novel is a quest.
sentences.chinese: 完成一部小说的初稿就是一次探寻。

sentences.english: It is necessary to write an outline before the first draft of the composition.
sentences.chinese: 在写作文初稿前有必要写个提纲。

sentences.english: It took me three weeks to write my first draft.
sentences.chinese: 我用了三周时间完成初稿。

sentences.english: FIRST DRAFT of second paper due at the beginning of class.
sentences.chinese: 本堂课开始时缴交第二篇报告初稿。

sentences.english: Then you will re-write the paper for submission on the date indicated on the syllabus.
sentences.chinese: 然后各位重写论文初稿并依照课表的日期缴交。

sentences.english: And so, he finished the manuscript back in Copenhagen.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他在哥本哈根完成了初稿。

sentences.english: The first draft was written half a century ago.
sentences.chinese: 但这部法律的初稿在半个世纪前就诞生了。

sentences.english: Who made the first draft of the document ?
sentences.chinese: 文件的初稿是谁草拟的？

definition: to go to press/to submit for printing
paper/treatise/thesis/CL:篇[pian1]/to discuss a paper or thesis (old)
to send (a manuscript) to the press
to make a draft/to draw up (plans)
